评论详情: Perfect Easter Dress! Fit well. Very comfortable. Perfect length for church!
Beautiful dress. Light weight, comfortable and very flattering.

Bought this last Summer for a girls trip and ended up becoming obsessed with it. The fit is so flattering and it’s super comfortable. The cutout is pretty small so I am able to wear it even to work (I work in fashion in an office, so I understand some people may not be able to wear it to work.

Highly recommend this dress! It is a great price but just a great dress, people didn’t believe me when I told them it was from Amazon! The fabric was light and airy, I wore it in August for my son’s birthday! The colors were bright but delicate, had to steam it, but it was not see through, didn’t shrink and hugged me up too, but flows on the bottom half! Such a comfy, staple summer/spring dress! Fits true to size
My favorite summer dress!! The color is even prettier in person and it looks so good on :))

Colors were accurate. The sleeves were really well made. Really soft material! It felt a lot nicer quality than I expected. It ultimately made my shoulders feel too broad so I am returning it but I do feel like someone with a narrower frame might really enjoy this!
Perfect cruise dress and fit was true to size
Loved the cut out in the middle! Lots of compliments on it. Vibrant colors! True to size. Lightweight material. Wrinkle resistant!
Loved how it fit me and it’s great for hot summer days.
Fabric is thin/ see through

This dress is great for just knocking around. It's a little casual for evening wear. Sizing was accurate. I bought a medium, I am 5'9 and weigh 135, 34DD. It's easy to wear, pull over your head. A good value. It's not see through at all. The fabric is thin but it could breathe a bit better.

评论概述: Cute for a beach or waterfront wedding
评论详情: I actually loved this dress as soon as I put it on. Currently in my postpartum era, so trying on clothes isn’t my favorite. But when I put this on it was comfy and flattering! Fabric seems sturdy and the color and pattern was vibrant. The only reason I returned it was because I went with another dress and I didn’t want to hold on to it in case my size changes again!
It was cute but did not work for me. I returned it but it was cute.

You know those posts of people getting a product that looks nothing like the picture, well this is the product. It was so ugly it was laughable, the pattern, color and length were nothing alike. I know sometimes things are a bit different than the pic, but this product was a true catfish.
Brighter than I expected. Returned
Super comfy, I could’ve sized down. Plenty room and bright colors! I bought some in diff colors

评论概述: Wore it for my birthday!! Get it!!!!
评论详情: I got so many compliments and everyone loved it. It fits sooooo good. I loved it. Gonna get another color.
Amazing dress fits beautifully. Great material would highly recommend amazing customer service one of the best dresses I’ve bought on Amazon.
The material is really thin. Also the hems and edging is rough. However, unless someone is too close to you, no one but the wearer would know. The colors are as pictured. It runs large.
So vibrant, comfortable & received many compliments
Wore this for maternity shoot and absolutely loved it fit so well! Loved it with the bump and I can even still wear it now and it’s beautiful!
So cute and flirty
Purchase this!! Love the fabric, love the cut, love the color!! It has POCKETS!!
Nice dress but not for me

I love the fabric on this dress it’s very lightweight and comfortable. Unfortunately it just did not work for me style wise. I tried it on with a couple of different bras and could not get it to work. The neck and back area is wide between the sleeves so my bra straps always showed in both the front and the back. I also tried it without a bra and there’s arguably enough support if you need it but oddly it made my chest look small - and I am a 34DD so that is really saying something for me. It might work better for someone who doesn’t need a bra at all. I also think it would’ve been more flattering if the sleeves weren’t quite so puffy because I think that is part of it - overwhelming which chest area. I didn’t think this triangle cut out was pretty cute and my bra did not show through that portion. Of course I wish it had pockets.
this dress is beautiful and fits perfect. it is a very light material but not see through. i am 5’6 and about 190 lbs and got a medium. i will definitely be buying more in the other colors!
I got the green and white dress. So pretty and flowy! Nice fabric and cute style. Love it!
Received so many compliments on this dress! Perfect for summer festivals
I am a postpartum mom. This dress fit perfect and made me feel comfortable.

Wore this for a summer wedding in Maine and received so many compliments. It's so comfy and well made. The peek-a-boo cut out is so flattering but still allows a standard bra to be worn with it. I am 5'4" 195lbs and wore a large.

评论概述: Fabric is very good, but fit is odd
评论详情: The fit is very odd, It makes you look very chesty.
This dress is so cute and comfy!!

评论概述: Post Partum and Large Chest Friendly
评论详情: After having babies back to back, my body is ALLLLL funky. This dress is SO flattering. Super pretty colors. For reference I’m 5’1 and around 150 with what I think (lol) are DDD breasts or bigger, since I’m nursing. I got the medium and it’s absolutely perfect.

I think this dress is absolutely beautiful! There isn’t a lot of stretch but enough to where it’s not uncomfortable. I do wish it was a little more stretchy. It’s very lightweight! I will definitely be ordering another color!
I absolutely love this dress. More beautiful on than the pictures show.
Super cute style. Fit is great and it’s very flattering. Perfect for a summer wedding

评论概述: bought for easter - so many compliments and so comfortable to wear
评论详情: bought this as a spring dress.  got so many compliments.  easy to wear, no ironing required, lightweight fun dress.  love the sexy little peep.  highly recommend
The material is light and airy!!!! The dress is flowy and gives the beach, brunch, or picnic vibes. I like the off the shoulder too because it makes me feel feminine and pretty.

This dress is very flattering and cute. Perfect spring/summer dress to wear to a garden party. very comfortable and not too heavy. nice quality.  For reference I am 5'5", 135 lbs, usually a 4-6. I ordered a size small and it fit great!

This dress is perfect for summer. It’s great quality, well made, comfortable and so flattering. I recently wore it to a wedding and got so many compliments! The color is bright so be warned but it’s fun and makes you look tanner too. I wore it off the shoulder but it looked just as good with the sleeves too. If you’re on the fence - buy it!
Cheap polyester but at least the dress is lined. The pink is much brighter than the photo so I went with the blue. I am a size 22 and the XXL fit me.
Cute dress…fit in all the right places!

This dress is so lightweight, soft and comfortable.  You can wear it with the sleeves up or down off the shoulder.  I love that you can still wear a bra with it, even with the little cut out.  Definitely wash it on cold like it says to keep the vibrant colors.  I might buy the dress and every single color, haha!  I’m 5’ 3”, 150 lbs, 34D and the medium fits perfect.

Super comfortable, very modest, and really lightweight. Perfect for a summer wedding. No pockets :( You can also wear a bra with it and it won't show in the back. I do think for almost $50 it should be a little cheaper; the material is quite thin. But there is a slip so it's not see through.

Bought this for a bridal shower. Very high end, summer feel. I’m 5.2ft and 150lbs and currently 3 months PP. Very flattering, was able to wear a strapless bra without it showing. Easy to nurse in by pulling down the sleeves
Best purchase that I made!
So cute for the price and I’m 5’3 so finding dresses that don’t drag are great!
I really loved the pattern of this dress. I like to wear a slimming body suit so it didn't work for this dress since the stomach has an open spot. Bummed it didn't workout
I wore this for a wedding. I got so many compliments and it fit well. I am usually self conscious in dresses and I felt great.
I only give it 4 stars because they were getting off the shoulder and it was very uncomfortable to be fixing it. But it's a beautiful dress and it comes like the image.

Bought this dress for a wedding and it was a hit! Very comfortable to wear even in 95 degree weather. I got so many complements and felt really great all night.  I’m 5’8” and currently between an 18 and 16 in jeans depending on the brand- I ordered an XL for the dress and it was great.

I fell in love with this dress!  I am 5'3 135lbs and wear a S/M 6/8  for all brands.  I ordered this in a medium but returned because I will need a small.  Always so excited when something is to big! The dress is flowy and colors vibrant.  Get it now for any summer event.  You will not regret this purchase.
Really liked the color and fitting of the dress.

This stunning dress is an absolute showstopper! With its vibrant colors and flawless fit, it's the perfect choice for any occasion. Available in a range of gorgeous hues, this dress is a must-have for lunch dates, romantic evenings, and elegant church gatherings.

This dress is amazing, super flowy, light fabric, with a beautiful design. I got a size XL, I’m 5’2 and weigh over 200 pounds. I think this is worth the money if you want to feel confident. It was slightly big in the chest but I am unsure if I could’ve sized down. However, no issues with the sleeves staying up.

Love the pattern, cut and colors of this dress! The material is super soft and the dress is lined. My only minor complaint is that it is a tiny bit snug over my chest which I could probably size up one to fix, but the back is super stretchy so it’s not uncomfortable.

I wore this is 85-90 degree heat. It was so easy to wear. Mainly because you had great air flow the entire time. Wrinkles were not really an issue, the fabrics is light weight, and not see thru. I am around 43 inches in the bust and it fits so so good. The smocked back is to die for!!
I got so many compliments on this dress! It was so comfy and cute. I was a little worried about the gap under the torso but you can still wear a bra without that being seen. Great purchase!
Colors are just as pictured. Beautiful details
This dress is perfect! I’m thinking about buying g another print . I got 4 compliments when I went out to dinner . 10/10
for the fabric quality it’s not bad. fits really well and colours are cute
So comfortable and good quality. Love that the skirt was lined
Lovely dress, I’m 5.4” and I ordered an M. Fabric is a little cheap feeling, but overall recommend it

Such pretty material, but sadly a poor-fitting dress - on me anyway.  The poofy sleeves seemed  a little childish and the thick elastic waistband didn’t stay in place well, leading me to believe I’d be constantly readjusting it.
Pictures didn’t show it but the dress was all neon colors when I got it.
Top portion completely overwhelmed my frame. I couldn’t wear a normal bra due to the cut at the neckline.
The dress was a great material I was very surprised about that for the price!

Likes: - easy to take on and off (perfect for pumping/breastfeeding) - loved the color scheme - works for a lot of different body shapes - loved the fit  Dislikes: - creates a uniboob - breast area is a bit large but worked for my size  I ultimately did not end up choosing it because the colors didn’t quite match the event.
I got the XXL in pink. It fit perfectly ans I sued it for a work event. So many compliments! When it arrived ot was very wrinkled but I used my steam iron and it removed all the wrinkles.
Perfect dress for a baby shower and wedding in the same day!
This dress is top notch! Really nice fabric that didn’t feel low quality, love the puff sleeves and super slimming. I wore it to a wedding and I got SO many compliments!

I loved this dress for a spring wedding. As a new mom, I was able to wear this dress and fit my portable breast pumps comfortably when needed. The light fabric did not feel cheap and was great for the price. It was nice that it was on the longer side for me at 5’6”.
Love how flattering the style of this dress is. The chest is a tad tight, making me consider trying a size up, but fits great everywhere else. Great length, and love the sleeves and how they fall.
Got this dress for an outside wedding and it was perfect. Very cool and breezy. Super comfy! I got a ton of compliments on it.
This dress is stunning!! If you’re thinking about ordering, just go ahead and do it.
Loveeeee! Great quality.
I am in LOVE with this dress. The quality is great. The cut and fit is so cute. True to size. Would absolutely buy again in other colors.
The perfect pregnant wedding guest dress! Great length and comfortable to wear all day/night.

评论概述: So glad I ordered this dress!
评论详情: I must have ordered 20 dresses for a shower I had coming up. Ordered this one last minute and I’m so glad I did! Very comfortable and very flattering. I got so many compliments 🙃 Don’t forget some self tanner on the cutout if that part of your body doesn’t normally see the sun!
Perfect dress for weddings or a date night . Super comfy and so beautiful.
I ordered a larger size. It fit a little large on me. I was a very pretty dress but I felt it didn't fit on me nicely. But wish it did because it really was beautiful.
This dress is great! The fabric is a good quality and it is so cute. Even better, the green pattern looks like it is Lilly. Highly recommend!

Dress arrived in a SHEIN Swim bag?? A few loose strands upon opening the package, which is pretty disappointing and speaks volumes on the quality. It is light weight, and the fabric feels cheap. It fits nicely and has some stretch to it as well. Not sure how to feel about it.
This dress was a very cute and flattering style but holy neon! It was even brighter in person that real life and I didn’t see myself wearing it.
The best dress! Fits as true to size Very comfortable and nice
Love this!!! Wore this to a bridal shower and a rehearsal dinner and loved it both times!!! I think I could've sized down but I love it either way!! I am 5'3" and 155 lbs and bought a large
Super cute! Wore this to dinner.
I absolutely love this dress. It is comfortable and very flattering. Love the puff sleeves and the small cutout in the front. I received so many compliments!
Bought this last minute for a trip and I’m so thankful I did! It’s light, flows and very flattering! Will be buying more colors
I got the dress and it smells like body odor, I’ll be returning it.

I was so excited for this dress, but sadly disappointed when it arrived. The dress itself was made well, but the colors were off, and fabric was the reason I returned. The sizing was okay, but length was shorter than expected, a true midi just below the knee rather than to the calf as pictured.

Bought tons of different dresses for a summer wedding in a budget, and none looked good on my body, until this one. I’m typically a large (can be medium in dresses) with a large bust and hips. This dress is PERFECT! The fit is flattering, and the neck line is great. Length is a bit longer at calf level. Material isn’t super great, but doesn’t feel like it will fall apart like most Amazon dresses. Definitely a win and the colors are gorgeous!
Had to return the colors were too pale for me Very pretty

I am absolutely in love with this dress! The green color is so vibrant and has such a happy vibe to it. I wore it to a wedding and got so many compliments :) It did arrived quite wrinkly but after I washed and dried it, it was ready to be worn. No iron needed for that occasion!
So pretty and good quality!
Fits perfectly!!! Super cute
The dress felt fine. It wasn’t see-through. The material was fine. I just felt like a whale when I put it on.
Beautiful dress, well made, very flattering
Loved the dress, colors and fit ❤️

评论概述: Vibrant wide necked, puffy sleeves midi dress
评论详情: Love that this dress can go from daytime to summer night out! Definitely eye catching colors, don’t order if wanting more subdued hues. Fits well for 5’5” 150 pounds
